questions.question: What is the primary purpose of a Functional Design Specification (FDS) in an Instrumentation and Control project?

answers.a: To specify the installation details of instruments
answers.b: To define the functional requirements of a control system
answers.c: To outline the testing procedures for instruments
answers.d: To describe the maintenance schedule for instruments

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a type of instrument calibration?
What is the purpose of a Loop Diagram in an Instrumentation and Control project?

answers.a: To show the electrical connections between instruments
answers.b: To illustrate the pneumatic connections between instruments
answers.c: To depict the functional relationship between instruments and control systems
answers.d: To describe the mechanical installation of instruments

questions.question: Which document outlines the sequence of activities to be performed during commissioning?
What is the primary objective of Factory Acceptance Testing (FAT)?

answers.a: To test the instrument's functionality at the site
answers.b: To verify the instrument's performance at the factory
answers.c: To inspect the instrument's mechanical installation
answers.d: To calibrate the instrument at the factory

questions.question: Which of the following is a type of documentation typically used during commissioning?
What is the purpose of a Pre-Commissioning Checklist?

answers.a: To verify the instrument's functionality during commissioning
answers.b: To ensure that all necessary documents are available
answers.c: To check the instrument's installation and mechanical completion
answers.d: To test the instrument's performance during startup

questions.question: Who is typically responsible for developing the Commissioning Plan?
What is the primary focus of Site Acceptance Testing (SAT)?

answers.a: To test the instrument's functionality at the site
answers.b: To verify the control system's performance at the site
answers.c: To inspect the instrument's mechanical installation at the site
answers.d: To calibrate the instrument at the site

questions.question: Which of the following is a benefit of proper commissioning?
